title: By the King, a proclamation
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the thirteenth day of January, 1674, in the six and twentieth year of our reign."
"Permitting sailings and offering letters of marque to privateers"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
